g.title: leaf_8
g.text: This is a standalone program to restore orb in the event that a knit
results in an unusable orb module.

g.title: leaf_19
g.text: file in the root directory will contain any
knit-modified files from the last pass.

g.title: leaf_22
g.text: to the .orb file, maintaining a data structure in the meantime; this will
be in Lua-native table format, at first, eventually Clu(den).

g.title: leaf_31
g.text: os.exit("Must be called with a root codex directory", 1)
s:chat("No contents in orbback. No action taken.")
